name: 73rd Memory ~ 73回目記憶
description:
73rd Memory is a game made for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 7

Satori Maiden of the Palace of Earth Spirits has found a powerful book which she plans to combine with her mind reading power of the Third Eye to become a powerful force to be reckoned with.

To test out her powers, she told Hakurei Reimu about her powerful artifact in order to challenge her to a danmaku duel. Can you lead Reimu to beat Satori's Ridiculous Game? Are you going to live to see the book's Sealed Demon Finale?

Controls

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Z to Shoot
  • Shift to Focus
  • T/Y to Raise/Lower volume
  • F11 to toggle fullscreen (Please maximize the game window before entering fullscreen for the best resolution)

Credits

  • iceing11 - Project Lead, Programmer, Writer
  • alananhkspace - Art
  • CuteShibaAuthur - Music, Sound Effects, Art
  • pathtolegend - Music
  • Eyyyyyyja - Translation

Special Thanks / Assets Credits

  • Haley Wakamatsu - Determination: Better Undertale Font
